unnormalised: Hey, these athlete bios are fab! Reminds me of "Chak De! India" but real. Always inspiring to read about folks like Mithali Raj, you know? Knowing their journey, maybe from a small village near Kanpur or training at NIS Patiala, makes their 10,000+ Rs. crore IPL contracts and 50 km runs even more amazing! Great stuff.
